desc:
*Ba-dum-tiss!*

In addition to providing 10 defense, equipping this will cause you to beat your drums into the start of every battle!

Every battle you begin will additionally drain 5 HP from you, if you have over 5. As long as you do, you will also start the battle with ğŸ’› Absorption 10, acting as a 10 HP shield against damage.

Excess Absorption vanishes at the end of the battle, so consider carefully if you really want to use this shield or not. It has no downside in longer battles, but 1-turn or low-damage fights become much more draining than normal.
